name: Verify a customer can deposit funds into their bank account
description: This test verifies that a logged-in customer can deposit funds and that the balance is updated correctly. It also validates that negative deposits should be rejected (known bug BUG-003).
descriptionHtml: This test verifies that a logged-in customer can deposit funds and that the balance is updated correctly. It also validates that negative deposits should be rejected (known bug BUG-003).
statusMessage:
The following asserts failed:
	Balance should increase by 500 after deposit. expected [1501] but found [1001],
	Negative deposit amounts should be rejected, but application indicates success. expected [false] but found [true]
statusTrace:
